channel.title: Grants and Funding for community stuff
channel.description:
[ **This is a wiki** ]
## Comrades ! **Let us collect all grants, funding and fellowships for events, spaces and community improvements here.**
Future of ActivityPub (?) 200.000€ https://guide.opentech.fund/our-funds-and-fellowships/core-infrastructure-fund
## General Support
https://guerrillafoundation.org/what-we-do/grantmaking/
https://www.thespace.org/commissioning
$3,500 for "Special Interest Groups (SIG) or Local communities" : https://www.isocfoundation.org/grant-programmes/
---
For Fediverse / User Freedom Awareness [de] [bridge](https://www.stiftung-bridge.de)
---
[**Mozilla Grants**](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/grants/)
---
[**Community Empowerment Program**](https://internetfreedomfestival.org/community-empowerment-program/)
---
## Events [**OTF Community Lab** – Empowering a stronger, more diverse internet freedom community](https://guide.opentech.fund/our-labs/community-lab) The Community Lab provides support for events - an essential component in building a stronger, more vibrant internet freedom community.
## Travel [**ECF Travel Grants** (Europe)](https://ecflabs.org/step-travel-grants)
## Supporting Hackathons
http://garage48.org/en
## Supportive Spaces
**EST** [**Massia**, Pärnu County in southwestern Estonia](http://www.massia.ee)
**GER** [Berlin **Wannseeforum**](https://wannseeforum.de/de/stiftung)
[SH **One week of time**](https://www.toepfer-stiftung.de/en/raum-geben/) see also [de] https://www.toepfer-stiftung.de/en/eine-woche-zeit/
**FR** [Saint Erme near Rheims **Performing Arts Forum**](http://on-the-move.org/files/news/a.PAF_INFO_engl.pdf)

item.description:
[ This is a wiki ]

Comrades !

Let us collect all grants, funding and fellowships for events, spaces and community improvements here.

Future of ActivityPub (?)
200.000€ https://guide.opentech.fund/our-funds-and-fellowships/core-infrastructure-fund

General Support

Guerrilla Foundation

Grantmaking - Guerrilla Foundation

Programme Objectives and Focus Areas The Movement, Backbone & Reflex objectives, focus on our core grant-making activities. Learn more about our theory of change here and our approach to progressive philanthropy here and of course check out our...

The Space – 11 Apr 16

Get commissioned

Commissioning Round now closedOur 2020 commissioning round is now closed for applications. To be notified of future commissioning rounds please sign up to our newsletter below.

$3,500 for “Special Interest Groups (SIG) or Local communities” :
